message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice. I'm feeling generous, but let's not drag this out. How about a 52.5 / 47.5 split?
Come on, Bob! Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a good compromise!
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. We both lose out with each passing round. Let's end this with a fair 50/50 split.
